job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field

jd: From: Bandana Das, iTech US bandana.d@itechus.net Reply to: bandana.d@itechus.net Hi, Greetings, This is Bandana from ITech US Inc. Given below are the details of the position with one of our clients and was wondering if you would be interested or can recommend someone who would be interested in this job. Job Role: Java Full stack Developer Job Location: Quincy MA (Need local ID proof) Duration: 12+ months contract Years of experience: 8+ Years Onsite From Day 1 | Max Rate: $55/hr on c2c Visa: H1B | Need passport number along with the submission Must have: ReactJS, Microservices, Spring boot, core java Education: At least a bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Computer Science, Software/Electronics Engineering, Information Systems, or a closely related field is required Thanks & Regards BANDANA DAS
